messages.content: What is the purpose of ComfyUI_fsdymy?

ComfyUI_fsdymy is a custom node for ComfyUI that provides three main functions: 1) Saving and previewing images without metadata information, 2) Expanding prompts using a domestic large language model (Zh spa Ai), and 3) An IPAdapter layered weight node.
How does ComfyUI_fsdymy handle metadata information when saving or previewing images?
ComfyUI_fsdymy removes the metadata information, which includes workflow data, when saving or previewing images.
Which large language model does ComfyUI_fsdymy use for expanding prompts?
ComfyUI_fsdymy uses the domestic large language model Zh spa Ai (智谱Ai) to expand prompts.
What is the website for the Zh spa Ai large language model used by ComfyUI_fsdymy?
The website for the Zh spa Ai large language model used by ComfyUI_fsdymy is https://bigmodel.cn/.
Where should the API key for Zh spa Ai be configured for ComfyUI_fsdymy?
The API key for Zh spa Ai should be configured in the 'key.json' file located in the 'ComfyUI\custom_nodes\ComfyUI_fsdymy' directory.
What is the IPAdapter layered weight node in ComfyUI_fsdymy?
The IPAdapter layered weight node is one of the features provided by ComfyUI_fsdymy, which allows for layering and weighting of IPAdapter nodes in ComfyUI.
How many main functions does ComfyUI_fsdymy provide?
